comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gauravcanon>@gauravcanon</denchmark-link> it is a private collab, pls rather share a minimal example here, or better make it is a test case...

I think this problem is not related to PyTorch-lighting. This is transformer update <denchmark-link:https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/pull/4510#issue-421650163>huggingface/transformers#4510 (comment)</denchmark-link>
Sorry can close
